alert.note: Alert for Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 2:42AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Rooks County through 345 AM CDT... At 242 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Plainville, or 27 miles northwest of Emmeram, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Plainville, Stockton, Palco, Damar, Zurich, Codell and Webster State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
